Title: 37565 - Protecting Your Valuables from Your Kids
Direction: 500 words: In 3-6 subheadings, talk about how to protect the valuable things in a home, like jewelry and electronics, from the damage kids can do. Discuss a few ways to protect things from the kids, like putting a password on your tablet and smartphone, storing jewelry in a safe place, keeping the car safe, and getting insurance on things you can't hide, like the TV. The audience is parents who are looking for easy solutions to protecting their valuables. The anchor text can go in the section about insuring personal property and choosing a company that other consumers love.

Title: 37567 - Saving Money in the Modern World
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 ways that you can save money on things that are modern necessities, like internet bills and mobile phone plans. The target page is a home decoration blog that also touches on topics like autism and frugality. Include the client link by pointing out the advantages of phone insurance as a better way to replace a broken phone than simply paying the cost of a new one. Your audience is people who are trying to save money.

Title: 37577 - The Best Bargains in Everyday Expenses
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 items that you can save money on by shopping for bargains. Mention cell phones as one of the items; the client link is to an Assurant review page, so mention how you can look at insurance to save yourself replacement costs on cellphones in the long run. Other ways to save money can include shopping online for staples (including looking into grocery delivery) and using e-tailers as an alternative to department stores. Your audience is people trying to save money.
